page.title: 13The M9 Motorway Stirling
page.content: This is a main route for traffic going north and south quickly. It is mainly used by cars, both private and company. As many as{ 400}can pass by our area in half an hour, as many going North as going south. Mainly it is used by private cars at the weekend travelling quickly north to Perth, Dundee or, perhaps in the other direction, to{Glasgow}or{Edinburgh. Cars can reach their destination much quicker by using the M9. Other vehicles mainly using the M9 are commercial lorries and vans some of those are local, but most of the lorries are long distance, carrying goods of various descriptions. Approximately 65% are Scottish companies, 33% are English and a small percentage are Welsh or Irish. Vans tend to be local.
